name: JumpCubox
description:
JumpCubox is a physics-based 2.5D platformer.
Roll and jump your cube through harsh traps in order to reach the goal.

You have 30 levels to complete, collecting coins as you go!
There are 3 coins in each level.
・Level clear: Reach the goal safely!
・Coins: Find the coins and get them!
・Time Attack: Try to complete each level within the time set for it!

You can also wall jump, climb up hills, touch switches to open doors, and clear various other gimmicks!
